channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by GESOP for El Periódico, 12–18 April 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Partido Popular (EPP): 11–14 seats
  • Partido Socialista Obrero Español (S&D): 11–14 seats
  • Unidos Podemos (GUE/NGL): 9–12 seats
  • Ciudadanos–Partido de la Ciudadanía (ALDE): 15–19 seats
  • Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats
  • Partit Demòcrata Europeu Català (ALDE): 0–1 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by GESOP for El Periódico, 12–18 April 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by GESOP for El Periódico, 12–18 April 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Popular (EPP): 18.6–23.6%
  • Partido Socialista Obrero Español (S&D): 18.1–23.1%
  • Unidos Podemos (GUE/NGL): 15.8–20.6%
  • Ciudadanos–Partido de la Ciudadanía (ALDE): 25.8–31.4%
  • Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya (Greens/EFA): 2.1–4.3%
  • Partit Demòcrata Europeu Català (ALDE): 1.3–3.1%

item.title: Opinion Poll by NC Report for La Razón, 9–13 April 2018 – Seat Projections

item.title: Opinion Poll by NC Report for La Razón, 9–13 April 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

  • Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya (Greens/EFA): 2.0–4.1%

  • Euskal Herria Bildu (GUE/NGL): 0.4–1.6%
  • Coalición Canaria (ALDE): 0.1–0.9%
